summary: Parse a string into an array (create)

ports.name: text
ports.text: The array-data you want to use, e.g. `100,200,300`

ports.name: separator
ports.text: The separator to use, e.g. `,` (comma) when your text is `foo,bar,baz`

ports.name: Numbers
ports.text: If set, the values inside the array will be interpreted as numbers (not strings)

ports.name: Parsed
ports.text: Triggers once the array has been parsed

ports.name: length
ports.text: The length of the parsed array

changelog.message: code cleanup - moved variables outside of for loop
changelog.author: andro

changelog.message: fixed the interpolation method when working with strings, temp fix
changelog.author: andro
